title: Recommendation for Presentation Binding in NYC?
content:
Hi...

I’m looking for a shop that can wire-bind (wire-o) a bunch of 80 page presentations for me...I’ve got the cover, and the backer, and the guts...and I reeeeeallly don’t want to bring this to kinkos and have them do a bad spiral binding job on it.

If anyone has a recommendation in the NYC area, leave a comment.

Many thanks in advance!!

Susy

 [‹ Font to compliment Times New Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012132/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46476 "Go to previous forum topic") [Carol Twombly.. Please help me! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907012132/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32680 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sconnor
